whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.content: GREGORIUS is a recognized manufacturer of spare parts for internal combustion engines, specializing in the production of cylinder liners and valve seats. Our company has been delivering high-quality products tailored to individual customer needs for years.

ourGoal.title: Our Goal
ourGoal.content: Our main goal is to deliver products of the highest quality, continuously modernize production processes, and care for the natural environment. We strive to meet our customers' needs through innovative solutions and a professional approach to every order.

tradition.title: Tradition
tradition.content: Our company's history dates back to the 1960s, when we started as a workshop for grinding cylinders and crankshafts.

development.title: Development
development.content: In 2004, we underwent a significant restructuring, investing in quality and production efficiency. This allowed us to significantly expand our customer base in Poland and abroad.

products.title: Products
products.intro: GREGORIUS is a recognized manufacturer of spare parts for internal combustion engines, specializing in high-quality cylinder liners and valve seats.

dryLiners.title: Dry Liners
dryLiners.content: We produce thin-walled dry cylinder liners with internal diameters up to 240 mm. Our products are designed for all types of internal combustion engines, compressors, and lawn mowers. We also fulfill individual orders according to customer specifications.

wetLiners.title: Wet Liners
wetLiners.content: We offer thick-walled wet cylinder liners with internal diameters up to 240 mm. Products designed for all types of internal combustion engines and machinery. Individual orders available according to customer requirements.

valveSeats.title: Valve Seats
valveSeats.intro: We produce valve seats in three versions:
valveSeats.gasoline: For gasoline engines: made of special heat-resistant cast iron
valveSeats.gasolineLpg: For gasoline-LPG engines: made of specially developed cast iron for more demanding operating conditions
valveSeats.diesel: For diesel engines: made of special cast iron for particularly difficult conditions
valveSeats.content: Valve seats are produced for all types of engines. We fulfill individual orders.

trade.title: Trade
trade.content: We sell castings for liners and valve seats in the form of tubes, castings for individual liners, and shafts, MAHLE Poland products.

honing.title: Liner Honing
honing.content: We perform honing of cylinder liners.

production.title: Production
production.content: On individual orders, we manufacture parts from cast iron, steel, and non-ferrous metals according to customer requirements.

technology.title: Technology and Manufacturing Conditions
technology.intro: GREGORIUS produces its products according to developed technology adapted to technical requirements for spare parts for internal combustion engines and the high demands of its customers.

materials.title: 1. Materials
materials.content: Materials come from MAHLE Poland in Krotoszyn. Cast iron castings for cylinder liners and valve seats are produced in accordance with relevant industry standards.

processing.title: 2. Processing
processing.content: Cylinder liners and other products undergo heat treatment to improve mechanical properties. Production uses a wide range of machine tools - from universal lathes to specialized LSP class automatics and ultra-modern GILDEMEISTER CNC machine tools. Final precision is achieved through grinding on shaft grinders.

conservation.title: 3. Conservation
conservation.content: All products are preserved with anti-corrosion agents from Fuchs.

packaging.title: 4. Packaging
packaging.content: Products are packaged in cardboard boxes. Bulk packaging is adapted to individual customer requirements.

shipping.title: 5. Shipping
shipping.content: Ordered products are shipped to customers according to individual arrangements: by courier, mail, or own transport.
